long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Helix Stack Ball is a challenging arcade game where you control a ball that bounces down a spiral tower. Your goal is to avoid obstacles and destroy all the stacks of blocks. The more stacks you destroy in a row, the bigger your combo will be, and the faster you will progress through the level.

The game has over 100 levels, each with its own unique challenges. You will need to use your skills and reflexes to complete all the levels and become the master of Helix Stack Ball.

How to Play

Use the mouse to control the ball.
Click and hold to make the ball fall faster.
Release the mouse button to make the ball bounce.
Avoid the obstacles and destroy all the stacks of blocks.
Features

Over 100 challenging levels
Cartoon graphics
Fun sounds
Little particle
Basic control

Tips

Timing is essential.
Use the obstacles to your advantage.
Don't give up!

- Play others games on the top-left menu
